subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Honored at the 28th annual Thurman Munson Awards dinner at a Midtown hotel, Alex Rodriguez chatted up a surprise guest — defensive end Justin Tuck of the Super Bowl champion Giants.
snippet: Honored at the 28th annual Thurman Munson Awards dinner at a Midtown hotel, Alex Rodriguez chatted up a surprise guest — defensive end Justin Tuck of the Super Bowl champion Giants.
